dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Magnolia Pictures
dmca.body:
November 9, 2006

Via Fax (650) 618-2680

Blogger Legal Support
DMCA Complaints

Re: "Cocaine Cowboys"

To Whom It May Concern:

1. It has come to our attention that a Blogger website is exhibiting an unauthorized version of the motion picture entitled "Cocaine Cowboys" (the "Picture").

2. The infringing material can be found at the following URL address:

http://la-villa-blogspot.com/2006/11/pedidococaine-cowboys.html

3. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact me at [redacted]@magpictures.com.

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allgedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

We thank you for your cooperation with this matter. Please do not hesitate to contact me directly at [redacted] should you have any questions.

Sincerely,

[redacted], Esq.
Head of Business & Legal Affairs
Magnolia Pictures

[redacted]@magpictures.com
[redacted] new york, ny 10001
tel [redacted] fax [redacted]
www.magpictures.com
